After a few days and after chasing the service center I got my phone back with a note that- There was a tamper being done in phone by an unauthorized person so the warranty is lapsed and you need to pay 18000 for changing it with a original Apple parts.- I made a complain and I received a call from Apple service center stating that they have found a non Apple part  inside the device. So the warranty is lapsed- I was repeatedly telling them that I had purchased the phone this was the first problem I had , why I will be going to a non service station for this. But as usual I am not being heard and I need to pay....Just to aware you all that-Don’t buy any product online from Amazon. As I feel that the tamper of my can happen over there and they had followed a customer by selling a second grade phone.- Don’t trust brand like Apple as they are selling the products online and now they completely taking no responsibility.- A non Apple parts was fitted inside a brand new phone and as a customer you will have no choice as you can’t find it.This is a pathetic state and pls do suggest how can it be taken up....

Title: iPhone Dead when you open the box
Reviews: Iphone not working since I opened the box. Apple support of little help. Amazon not taking the return. Asking for a report from Apple. Now I have to chase Apple to get a report. Nightmare starts when you buy from Amazon.

Title: Lifelong Android user switched to IOS.
Reviews: IOS:I am a lifelong android user, using android since HTC nexus. I was really doubtful if IOS can really fulfill my need like google does. and after switching, I love it. Man.. the phone is fluid. The OS amazes me, its super smooth. Those who still confused if they want to move to ios, just do it.Apple iphone XR :Well, Ive always used Longer phones like Sony Xperia Z3+ , Lg g7 thinq. This phone is a bit wide for me. It is taking time to used to with the width. And to be honest, dont go with the spec sheet. Yet it says ita 720p screen, but trst me, ive used 3k screen on Lg g7, this one is much better. Its same like a 4k tv with a crappy panel vs FHD tv with a top notch panel. Yet it says 3 gb ram, but 8Gb ram one plus have lag issues than this. Camera is as usual, Good, but not best. But low light photos are remarkable. Its good, Go for it.

Title: Really Awesome
Reviews: It’s a very awesome mobile. Overall it’s really good. Hats off to apple that they provide these kinda of awesome products.

Title: Great battery life
Reviews: I ordered this phone on Diwali offer. The phone which I got first had display issue , so I got replacement for that.my previous phone was iPhone 6 Plus.  After one week of using this phone, these are my honest review.  Firstly the phone has excellent battery life . For average use, the battery lasts more than a day easily. Although charging takes time ie about 2 to 3 hours from 10% to 100%. As I am used to iPhone home button, I’m feeling a bit uncomfortable with this phone as it has no home button. You have to swipe up every time from bottom to top to unlock the phone. It has no finger print sensor . So it’s a bit difficult to unlock while ur in bed as u have to put ur face in front of the phone for FACE ID. Reach ability is an issue if u use one handed. Especially while using Facebook, when u have to swipe down from bottom line to make ur finger reach the top screen clicking options. Display of the screen is a bit below iPhone 6 Plus. So all in all the phone is just about satisfactory.

Title: Waste of money
Reviews: Battery quality is worst I have honor 8c and it gives 2 days backup and this phone last only 12 hours with medium usage no fast charger takes tradatitional 3 hours for full charging if u want to waste your money then go for it if u r not brand conscious buy other brands phone with much more better  configurations that too almost half of its price

Title: iPhone XR display goes blank on the 2nd day!!!
Reviews: The iPhone XR goes blank the next day!!!I received my phone a day earlier than scheduled, thank u Amazon, I configured my phone and looked at features and slept that night. The next day morning the display went blank, the alarm rings but no display, the phone rings on a call but no display. By the end of 2nd day my ibrqnd new iphone is totally dead!!!..Now i want to return the phone but there is no option to return, only repair.What I rate this service as? I pay such a huge amount. and service is like this.

Title: Issue with every ios update !
Reviews: I am facing cellular network issue with every new update. As per my understanding, Hardware is not compatible with the OS.Price also reduced by 15k after 1 month only. I suggest all the buyers not to buy this phone.

Title: Waste of money
Reviews: XR has software issues after couple of days of purchase phone got stuck thought it’s once off issue n ignored .. post couple of more days frequency has increased , now the screens get blackout and need to try couple of times to revive .. waste product .. never expected this from Apple Product .. hardly 3 months n I’m frustrated with it.

Title: Original iphone
Reviews: I was bit worried about the authenticity of buying iphone online with unknown seller and by paying huge amount ,I took the  Risk but i would say amazon and seller  has done a wonderful job ,i checked the product  in apple website and its a genuine product with 1 year warranty..iphone is iphone with best processor,camera ,good battery life ,good for gaming and with  regular  updates from apple ..

Title: A Wonderful Budget iphone 📲
Reviews: It was my first iphone till date i was an android user . But believe me once you get over these phones you wont switch it awayUsing it since a few months i noticed below pros and cons :PROS :1) Battery life.  Its this phones biggest advantage as one can easily expect the juice to last for a  day and half in single charge of mild to heavy usage .2)Camera ( being a single lens it still captures perfect portraits and is doing better than many oppo and vivo phones )3)sound quality4)IOS5)loaded with many out of the box features and provides evenly and timely updatesCONS :1) screen quality it is simple Hd only not amoled or other . But it wont bother a simple user like me in a long run as the lcd is also best in terms of apple quality .2)still a bit expensive as compared to android counterparts.3)sometimes heavy gaming will cause a bit of lag that is most of the times unnoticeable.Overall verdictIts a gr88 buy if you have the budget as its an apple product it seems to last for at least 6-7 years without any hassles and the battery life is among the best on offes as compared to other products  and is good for office goers and gamers.Kudos to apple for providing timily updates and stability .

Title: Fantastic 👌👌👌!!!!
Reviews: You will be very happy with the product display is your concern don’t worry it is awesome, it has  very accurate colours . Battery is ok. Camera and performance are top notch.If you are into iOS you will love it, but if you love big specs of android (like 8 gb ram,1080p display) you will not consider it. In an iPhone specs don’t do justice to their awesome products. End line ‘It is awesome ‘😉.  Peace ✌️

Title: If you really looking for something good dont buy this phone.
Reviews: Sep 2020-This is a product which lets down the whole high end feel of an iPhone. Apple has packed in a very sophisticated software hardware system in a rather disappointing design and the phone is bulkier and heavier than any of its competition in the market. The premium feel of the product is completely let down and left to enjoy is a good software interface of ios and an excellent camera. Overall a cheap buy for an apple lover but for a first time user the phone is totally let down. Theres a continuous network issue if using dual sim mode..Aug 2019 review- Its just a phone with good features, if switching from android you will love using its interface, a pure secure platform and flawless running experience.

Title: Exchange Value!
Reviews: Don't go for "Exchange Value" lolipop, its not worth it. The value for the exchanged phone given by amazon is undervalued, you can get a better deal on Cashify.com (only in selected city) and the amazon delivery guy who is also happened to be verification guy will also check your phone for any scratch or defect (like a jeweler) will reject upfront if he find any defect even a hairline and you will not get the New Phone as well even if you try to pay the balance amount. Then you have to re-order the phone once they canceled your current order. Its a hectic process for under valued exchange offer. Not sure what they expect from an old phone.

Title: Accessories issue
Reviews: Generally I don’t prefer buying costly items online.Less guarantee on products / accessories originality.Main product have some visible serial numbers / IMEI to cross check but the accessories ???Charger adapter: Didnt work in 2 months. Got replaced as covered in warranty.Earphones Mic: Bad condition. Frequent issues.Earphones Left speaker: No sound exactly after 1 year of purchase. So could not replace also.So for costly items, don’t prefer online purchase.

Title: Network connectivity is so weak.
Reviews: I'm posting review after using 1 year of this phone XR red.Positive-Battery Life is betterCamera Quality is goodOperating system and processing is goodFace Unlock works fastly*NEGATIVE*1.Network Connectivity is the worstAt the same time in my other phone for the same telecom company, network shows available but in this phone there is no network.2. Call logIPhone should update the call log featureIn this phone very few call history shows and if you call a single number for ten times in a day it shows ten times in call log just like a old feature phones and therefore the call log will be full with a few numbers.3. Call Record should be available now a daysIPhone says call record is against privacy of someone but I think today it is very important for everyone against old mentality.

Title: Camera and display quality is not good.
Reviews: Dude i was confused first that which one i should buy oneplus 7pro or iphone xr, so i choosen xr for 40k on offer and every thing ia good but i am dissapointed with tha camera quality and display quality really i have iphone 7plus also but the display is far far better then xr and the camera is also better but i know iphone 7plus has dual camera and that's ok but dude detailing is missing and also zooming is also missing we get digital zoom which reduces tha quality....

Title: Apple iPhone XR (64GB) - Black - Value for Money
Reviews: I have purchased this Apple iPhone XR (64GB) - Black for my use.It has been more than a week since I started using Apple iPhone XR (64GB) - Black and the experience is quite good. I have chosen a Black color variant because it gives an executive look. I found a smooth operating system, good camera performance and a good sound quality. The important thing is the face ID which is very fast and working well in my handset. I was a bit skeptical about how to use the OTP messages and password recognition, (since this handset doesn’t have finger print unlock), but all my doubts were clarified when once I started using this handset.  The only one thing I am unhappy is the battery draining which is very fast compared to android devices. The phone is bulky, heavy and weighing more than 190 grams. We need to use a protective case to protect Camera bump and glass on both sides. Except that the other features are all working well. The Amazon was very prompt in processing and delivering the Handset in scheduled time even though the festive sales were going on.....

Title: Value for Money!! True Performer!!
Reviews: I believe firmly that this is the Best Affordable Phone Apple has ever made!!!1. Superb Build2. Amazing Screen, Excellent Sunlight visibility, Great contrast and watching content on this screen or Reading is just an absolute pleasure!!!3. A12 Bionic chip is flawless!! day-to-day usage, Gaming, Multi tasking all works great.4. Being a singer, as I record songs in Karoke apps like Smule and Starmaker, recording I made thru iPhone were the best so far in the huge list of phones I used, eversince I started singing. In-Box headphones are wonderful and the Mic just works amazing. (Interested to check my recordings, please check with the ID : vindurocks, same ID for both Smule and Starmaker).5. The highlighting factor about this phone is the Battery Life. The A12 Bionic chip is such power efficient that it my phone still has atleast 40% battery left whern I reach home after work!! and thats incredible looking at the battery capacity that apple furnished in the phone. (I have my Data connection always ON, bluetooth ON and connected to Airpods, and when in Office, always connected to WI-Fi)6. Camera is Good too on this.. though not the best camera apple made, but it gets the job done for me. So no complaints on that as well!!7. Buttons are super tactile and clicky.. Ear piece is clear. Signal reception is Good as well. So its actually works well as a phone apart from all other shenanigans I mentioned earlier. So Full Marks Apple :)8. The face unlock is blazing fast and its more secure than most of the android phones out there. So no complaints for not furnishing a fingerprint reader. (after the upgrade to iOS 13.2, face unlock became much more efficient. So great job done.On a whole, even if you are a power user, this phone will suffice with all the aspects you are expecting out of a smart phone. And my sincere advise to other who are out there is, if you already own this phonne, then don't go for iphone 11.. instead, use it for 2 years and go for iPhone 12, as we are expecting some breakthrough features with the same.So this is my opinion and Kudous to apple for making this attempt in making this iPhone a Great Value For Money device.

Title: Awesome phone
Reviews: Good at 52k (the price at which I got the phone). The phone wasn’t worth 76k when it was launched but at 52k it justifies itself.Pros:iOS is very smooth and good. I am Using an iOS device for the first time but am really happy with the OSBattery life is excellent. I use to get almost 7 hrs of screen on timeDisplay is also very good. It is sub 1080p but  is an excellent panel. Comparing the other competitors in the market like S10e and Oneplus 7 pro, it's display is not as good as the others but is okayish..A12 Bionic chip is excellent. No matchBuild is soild and goodCons:Price is too high. I got it for 52k at sale but still it's quite expensive. I think 45k would have been good.Camera was overhyped by the youtubers but the camera is no match to its elder siblings.Apple is charging quite a bit of premium but still is offering a 5W slow charger:(Face ID is fast and secure but no match to a physical fingerprint scanner in terms of speed.

Title: Best iPhone i ever used..........
Reviews: Excellent deals offered by Amazon 38k after bank discount.......best iPhone for every aspect.......good camera ...... battery backup excellent......... looks elegant.....feels premium in hand.....and  one think i said to all , though it's a 720p display but display is excellent quality.......there is no panicked about it....and also played 1080p video in YouTube.......so .....go for it.......this is best budget iPhone at this price point......thank you Amazon........

Title: Amazon freedom sale made me buy the Best Phone at a better deal 😍❤️
Reviews: I was always an iPhone user  till 8+ , then thought of changing to note 8 I loved that phone too but over the period of time I started realising there is nothing like IOS and iPhone. After using two high end androids (i keep changing phones) I witched back to iPhone and OMG I must say it has even become better it is so smooth like a butter on pan and IPhone X r is beauty, Liquid Retina is awesome and beautiful will not make you miss oled also the battery back up is woooowww .  This is the first ever phone I bought thru AMAZON I was skptical but thought of taking risk and yes Amazon delivered what they promised thru FREEDOM sale got a very good deal for 128 gb everyday I fall in love with this phone ..go for it if you want a best experience using phone

Title: Great value for money
Reviews: iPhone XR is still a great buy. The price VS performance ratio on this phone makes it a very sensible buy. If you don’t care about the latest and greatest this one year old offering from Apple is a far better buy. Only down side on the phone are as follows:-1) no out of the box fast charging cables. (I love using it on a wireless charger which I charge for an hour during meals)2) no fingerprint scanner - I missed it initially but the Face ID works well.3) The new gimmickry of iPhone 11 cameras such as low light photos is not available. But I can live with that knowing well I paid almost half the amount of a new iPhone 11.

Title: One of the best phones even in 2019 that can satisfy your needs
Reviews: I got it during great Indian festival for 38,000rs. Great value for the price.Amazing display, beautiful  camera , awesome design and it's very slippery. I covered it with a case and the display gets scratched easily. So cover it with a protector too. Headsets are top class, fits perfectly.The USER INTERFACE is super simple . I got used to gestures and I'm enjoying it now.Camera: takes beautiful pictures even when in motion ! Sharp and less contrast pictures are classy !  The flash is the best !The stereo speakers are top classGives you a 3d feel or perfect stereo feeling while hearing songs !FaceTime ! Use it and iMessages !? There is nothing to beat that !Disadvantages using iphone XR !?BATTERY Charging speed : Gets charged slowly, but the entire day the battery works for you, unless you are a heavy gamer or something, like a photo editor! I wouldn't say that's a disadvantage.DESIGN:  Next, slippery hold and easily scratched display. Don't think twice to buy covers and screen protectors. Else your phone will be with dents and scratches. So you can't show off the colours of your display once it gets covered.Camera performance at night is little bit disappointing. Needs more light.Pixel 3 and iPhone 11 are better.Earphones slip when you move too fast. Again personally i don't advise or use ear phones while travelling unless necessary. So in that case, if you aren't wearing helmet or you sit in the window seat , it's a problem !I cloud storage is full in few days and if you think, google photos give free storage, then this is an issue (remember google doesn't give free storage for hdr photos)Overall, I'm new to Apple ! And this is my first ever apple product !But i feel a lot SAFER  than using pixel or any android phone.Siri seriously sucks !Google assistant is the best !Also this phone is water resistant/proof, but i haven't tested it !

Title: Good deal for the best phone !!!!!!!!!!
Reviews: Never thought about purchasing XR but couldn't stop myself when i saw this deal . Taken sudden decision and bought this. Very much worried till the delivery suspecting that the product would be refurbished or duplicate. But amazon kept thier commitment, i received a brand new orginal iphone.Coming from my star 5s that am using since 5 years...everything feel like magical in Xr!!i) Amazing battery life that too for an iPhone is the best feature i believeii) Butter smooth performance from ios with 3GB RAM, user interface is soo nice.iii) Super camera and professional 4k videos. You can get better outdoor macroshots in this comparing to any dslr range lesser 50kiv) Hassle free unlocking with face ID.. i was little concerned about fingerprint reader missing, but once you start using this you will understand fingerprint is outdated..all the necessary app supports face idAs my personal opinion an iphone is always an iPhone, you can never compare it with any of premium category android phones in most of the specification such as user interface, os updates, camera, life cycle  etc because instead of my 5s 2013 release, no one would be using an andorid phone of same category released in 2013.Iphone 7 and galaxy S7 came in 2016 almost with same prince range ..S7 is outdated long back and now S9 and iphone 7 are selling for same price. For sure S9 will be outdated this year and iphone 7 will be in the market atleast for 2 years!! So think wisely

Title: Peace of mind
Reviews: Easy to use, serves the purpose. I was an android guy for like last 7 years before that was using blackberry in between switched to ios as i used iphone 5c but at that time i was a bit disappointed may be because quite young i was and a bit techie but now i use my phone for basic purposes like calls, whats app, email, social media n bit gaming n music so it really handles that well though i was a bit hesitant at first as i was used to of finger touch sensor but seriously face recognition is damn good it works like a charm even when there is no light, so if you want no nonsense stuff n if it suits your requirements then go for it as now a days even droids are equally expensive in-fact some are more expensive like fold, razr etc. so just listen to your heart and buy ios or android and you wont go wrong, though i got mine in an offer for ₹43000 for 128 GB variant

Title: Fantastic phone upgrading from any of the previous versions specifically at the given price point
Reviews: I was looking to upgrade from my iPhone 6 and was confused about iPhone 11 & iPhone XR. Decided to go for iPhone XR just from the cost perspective. Only from Camera and Processor POV there is an upgrade in iPhone 11 rest remains the same.It has been 2 weeks since I purchased XR and I am blown away this is not just wit respect to iPhone 6 but also OnePlus 6T (another device that I have). Please find below my review on the below mentioned aspects:1. Processor and Overall Speed: XR is smooth as butter, the touch response is stunning I love the haptic touch. I am sure iPhone 11 has better speeds but XR does not lag behind in anyway whether is heavy games or basic functionality. 9/102. Camera: I love the camera though it does not the have the wide angle camera like 11 does but it does a great job. I like the portrait mode, one area wherein apple can improve the camera is introducing Night mode. Otherwise the Camera does a wonderful job (It is better than OnePlus 6T's camera) - 8/103. Cost: I got 128 GB version for 43K which is not at all a bad deal (I sold myt iPhone 6 for 7.5K effective cost is 35K). At this price point it is not short of any other premium devices in the market. iPhone 11 is for 70K for 128GB version.  10/104. Looks: The phone looks beautiful in the black. 10/105. Battery Life: After daily screen on time of more than 5 hours at the end of the day, the battery is at 30% typically which is amazing. Although it takes time to charge from 0 to 100% using the charger in the box. Waiting for Apple's fast charger to be launched in India. 10/106. iOS 13: Special mention to iOS 13 which is superb. 10/10Overall Rating: 9/10Thanks.

Title: Best Budget iPhone
Reviews: I’m writing this review after the use of 6 months. And till now I haven’t faced any kind of issue woth the product. Everything’s working absolutely good. No issues yet.Camera is good, not as compared to other X series since it’s a single lens camera. But as per single lens, it’s quite better than others, like iPhone 7 or 8.Battery back up is good.People who are seeing the reviews of issues with the display having less ppi. Believe me it’s not an issue. You won’t even find any difference.

Title: Just love it
Reviews: This is my 3rd iPhone in 5 years having used the last two for atleast 2 - 2.5 years each.And I love the iPhone brand.Considering tht my battery life of my last phone 6S was a huge issue especially in the last few months of my use ... the iPhone battery easily lasts 30-36 hours after full charge and while using all apps.The camera is good and it is quiet sturdy.

Title: Best iPhone at around 50k in 2020
Reviews: I was constantly debating over whether I should get an XR or a cheaper SE or a slightly costlier 11 but I guess I took the best call. The XR is the best iPhone one can get at around this price range in 2020. The camera, performance and display are outstanding. The battery life and hardware are also better than previous models. Been using it for a month now and haven’t had any lapses in usage yet. Got a 128 GB variant for 54.9k. Worth the purchase.

Title: One of the powerful iPhone!
Reviews: iPhone XR with A12 bionic chip with 3 GB RAM is fast. This is my 1st iPhone and I am very impressed with it's performance, processing power is fast and iPhone is very easy to use and it fits in my hand very well.Face ID work excellent, it unlock the phone in less than 1 second!! Although it has 6.1 inch screen but it feels so small in hand (which is good).I also have my Samsung Galaxy S9+, now I have 1 Android and 1 iOS. Very happy !!I verified the device on Apple's website by entering the serial number to check warranty and check this is genuine phone by verifying phone's model number. The iPhone XR is genuine and I got full 1 year Apple warranty! :DMany thanks to Amazon for their excellent service, I order this phone on 1st Oct and Amazon deliver it to me on 2nd Oct in the afternoon 2PM. Great job Amazon!

Title: having sleek design with one camera setup, i like back side clean
Reviews: iPhone XR performs better than those specs that it showed in paper for XR.The battery is very very good and performs very well with such a small batter that is lower than 3000 mAhAfter receiving XR,  I charged it up to 100 % then used with wifi up to 4 hours continuously and then go to bed leaving battery at 65 % and wake 2 AM then updated to iOS 13 and continue using it with my home wifi till 9 AM (almost 7 hours).and leaving battery at 11 % and then I again used the internet on it and left the battery at 4 % in 40 min.And currently writing a review at lappy and phone is at 4 %.So I can say that it works 11 hours properly on a full charge.NOTE: I used it only with social apps and productivity apps and all that, I have not played any game with it in this review

Title: I LOVE IT !!!!!
Reviews: I love it <3Some people are just giving bad opinions about the screen quality being a liquid retina display.All iPhones from 4,5,6,7,8, Xr and even the new iPhone 11 have same Liquid retina display and there is nothing wrong with it. Only X, Xs Max, Xs pro, 11 pro have OLED.So if you are upgrading from an older iPhone you won't even notice any difference.Don't let some poor opinions change your mind.If you like it just buy it without thinking twice.

Title: Iphone xr 128gb blue for great deal 👍🏻
Reviews: Thanks to amazon for giving it for great deal, iphone xr 128gb is absolutely fantastic, with good battery life, camera, and performance. Since 6 months waiting to upgrade from 6s, compare to 6s xr a bit bigger in screen size for me apart from that its a great device to use, thanks to the seller 3 years back got 6s from the same seller and it still works pretty well without any issues.Got this for 39k change with bank instant cashback and with exchange, amazon has given 6 months screen replacement warranty as well with valid apple warranty.. face recognition also works very fast..Cons: No 2x zoom for camera, portrait mode apart that its a great phone 👍🏻 Who wants to upgrade from 5s,se,6,6s go for this. With phone u get c type headphones, charger but not 3.5 jack as previous iphones.Pros : battery life is pretty decent it will last for 2 days.A great phone for pubg lovers as well.Portrait mode works pretty decent with different lighting modes.Overall I'm very happy with phone. Once again thanks to the seller and amazon for delivering the products as promised. 👍🏻👍🏻

Title: Simply Amazing XR
Reviews: Best iphone out there coming from iphone 6 , XR just blown my mind away . Below are pros n cons of the phonePros-1 . Perfect size and screen resolution. Don’t listen to those who are saying screen is bad they haven’t even seen it yet . True tone is really nice .2. Battery is beast . Best battery on an iphone even confirmed by APPLE as well .It can give you complete day on one charge on a moderate use . 7-8 hours screen on time .3 . Face id is awesome even in the dark it does not find any difficulty while recognising my face . You can login into apps using face id . So simple n smooth4 . Super performance with A12 Bionic chip and 3 gb of ram . IOS operating system is buttery smooth .5 .camera is just fantastic. Better than XS and XS max in my opinion because it uses just software for portrait mode instead of secondary camera .6 . Coral colour is just fantastic. Different colour in different lightning. Second best is white colour .Cons -1. Takes too long to charge with the charger thats come in the box . You can always buy a fast charger .2 . This phone is little bit on a bulky and heavier side as compared to other iphones due to large battery size side which is fine by me .Final verdictYou can go for it with your eyes closed . Better value for money than XS and XS max . Genuine product delivered by amazon and apario seller .

Title: In love
Reviews: I love this phone... especially since I wanted it for a long time... would recommend it for both apple owners and those looking to become iPhone owners...camera quality is amazing... was able to activate the esim without hazzels.. 2 reasons that I switched my old phone for...size was a concern initially since I was accustomed to only iPhone 5, SE, 6... lightning cable is a disadvantage  with this phone as the charging point n headset points are the same... but I knew it when I was getting it... so got used to it now

Title: Its Apple so no comments on their quality and user experience
Reviews: Its Apple so no comments on their quality and user experience. Fabulous purchase got it at 43K which is worth and enjoying it

Title: Nice phone
Reviews: I am writing this review after using this phone for more than 10 days now . I upgraded this phone from iPhone 7 . The phone is really good , worth a buy if its on good sale .  128gb - around 55kcamera -  quality is really good and better from 7 . Both front and back side camera .The colours is very original .Battery - It lasts for about 18hrs as I personally use it more for social media . GOOD EXPERIENCE WITH THIS .Charging - it may take more time  then iPhone 7 to charge the phone (That is the draw back for this phone )Very slow charging !!!! I will personally not suggest to use other iPhone charger in this phone because there is a little problem with that .Face Unlock - It works pretty good and fast even at night when the lights is off . You may find little problem when you are using your earphone and trying to unlock the phone . It generally takes time or does not accept . Every other time either you are wearing glasses even with SUNGLASSES  it works pretty good and fast .As the size of the phone is bigger from iPhone 7 it takes a while to get comfortable with it . Accessing full phone with single hand is difficult or not possible .Gaming - I have bought 128gb phone which is very nice that too on sale . the phone doest hang on heavy games .Display - The display quality is really good specially the night and day effect , it automatically sense out the mode so its really good for eyes . It doest damage the eyes or effect them . even in low brightness you can comfortably see all apps and read the data .All over its a good device and worth a buy if you buy it on SALE .

Title: deal was good so value for money
Reviews: the screen has a slight dot at the bottom which i noticed while fixing guard. If it comes out as mfr defect apple will certainly fix it. but doesn't seem serious, will take to apple while it is still in warranty to know more and update.Price is not low if you compare it with equivalent android phones, but quite good for apple product, so giving it 5*.When compared to similarly priced products:Pros:Processor.faceidcamera (might be 12mp but its much better than those who claim 48mp camera, images are real not AI type)sound (best)cons:average battery.screen resolution

Title: Loved it
Reviews: It's the latest offering from I phone. Simply great. Camera is superb. The glass back looks ultra premium, though I would suggest you to get a back protective case as glass is fragile. Got it in white and had to pay 1400 extra but it looks the best in white. You are spending 60000 on a phone so what's 1400 more to get the best

Title: DO NOT BUY THE IPHONE XR AND UPDATE TO IOS 13
Reviews: iOS 13 is a failed attempt from apple. The phone doesn't have a smooth wifi or network connectivity. Its worse than some other phones half the cost. Absolute disappointment. Even older phones like 5s and 6s don't show network issues while the iPhone XR has these issues. Apple support is clueless and can't solve the issue. Disappointed with this apple product. All else is good just that the phones connectivity which is the most important thing for a phone is atrocious. Avoid if u can.

Title: One time buy.
Reviews: Got the 128 GB model since an iPhone almost always run out of space and never have the option for an SD card like Android devices.Overall there's nothing much to say about the phone itself.It is pretty much a status symbol and has little to no utility value.The camera is the sole selling point on any Apple device.There is nothing much you can do other than basic stuff like surfing the internet, watching videos, chatting and the occasional phone call.You cannot even have the option for changing the wallpaper daily!The battery life is fine if your usage is not heavy. However, don't expect it to last you for a full day.Overall it's an ok ok phone and which people would buy before going back to an Android device after 3 years.

Title: This phone heats up
Reviews: I had been using iphone 8 plus before and not a single time did I ever experience that phone heating up even after extensive usage. This piece however heats up to the extent making it uncomfortable to hold. If I use it for less than 10 mins, it works fine but any usage beyond that makes it hot. And on top of that, if the brightness level is set to max, its becomes an iron box(pun intended). Not expected off an apple device !

Title: Overall it's a beautiful phone which is having capacity to enrich your standard.
Reviews: Their is No earpods no lightning cable or connector in that box and will call after few minutes it blanks the call,not even a bip. Kindly give me some suggestions to rectify that

Title: Premium phone
Reviews: Bought it for 45k during saleBeing a single cam phone yet it manages to capture better pics than some triple & quad cam phonesBattery life sucks. You can barely manage to pull out 1 day if using your phone heavily throughout the dayUI is just awesomeSuch a smooth touch feedbackOverall a good dealMy suggestion - although black one looks classic but it just looks like any other phone. So i would suggest to go with other color choices that make your phone look different from others

Title: Read b4 buying
Reviews: There's no defective in this phn but i hv never used iphone so i wanted to use it but my first expression wasn't gud i was feeling like i wasted 60k.. It's not friendly to use.. I don't know why apple makes so complicate.. Buy iPhone only in two cases if u hv lots of money nd u want give a try then go for it nd if u want to play games then go for it.. Otherwise don't buy it.... Android is far better than this iPhone

Title: Product is good but seller is not. Try other sellers than dusritha electronics
Reviews: Overall the product is good from face id to Liquid retina. One thing surely standout for me is its surrounding speakers, they are really good(as per my experience), i got impressed With the work they have put in speakers. Sound is loud and clear.I, myself is a ios user and have been using them from a long time but one thing which really let me down after using it for couple of days is its CAMERA. I mean, i expected much better results from it than 8/8plus but pictures from them are more or less same with a little software improvisations. One will surely miss the wide angle lens and NIGHT MODE for this price range as they are available on every other phone in the market even in low price range. CAMERA is a bit disappointment.Apart from that, i would like to suggest everyone to DON’t buy it from DARSHITA ELECTRONICS. I have gotten a product which was imported in september and was running on ios 12 so i had to installed ios13 on it. Beside it They sent a 45k worth product in single plastic packet and while opening the package i could see the dents on the phone’s box which were clearly tellinh me, how many times this has been hurled/thrashed while commuting here and all i was hoping that it shouldnt have damaged and somehow it was undamaged inside. It infuriated me, i even trying contacting them regarding this but i didnt get any satisfactory response.PS- if you can afford 11 just go for it. :)

Title: The revolutionary smartphone that makes Apple stand out from the crowd
Reviews: The iPhone XR is by far the best that Apple had to provide in the recent years with no doubt. Right from the camera to its horsepower battery backup, everything is top notch.And speaking of notch, the notch of the phone looks uber premium and gives a definitive all-over touch to the phone.Even while sporting an LCD display, one can never differentiate it from other models regarding the clarity and resolution. It still stands out.This review is made after using the phone for over 2 months.

Title: Display issue in 15 days- not sure whether genuine
Reviews: Not sure whether genuine product. Bought it on the first day of amazon sale. Within 15days, got a vertical line in the middle of display- see photos. Have bought 5 apple devices in the past and never had any problem with any of them so far. Since the return window closes within 19 days have to now take it to apple service center. Seriously makes me thing about the originality of the product.

Title: Best battery on an iPhone, yet!
Reviews: I am more or less stuck with the iOS platform because of the iwatch since I love its functionality. Upgraded from my 3yr old iPhone 7, was actually waiting for prices to drop post September this year  but when Amazon came up with an unbelievable prime deal, I couldn’t resist!Everything on the phone works as it is supposed to, no complaints! The battery however is a BEAST, I always used to carry my power bank along with me for the iPhone 7 but i no longer need to with the XR, easily gives me an entire day of use with more than 6hr SOT and still have about 25-30% juice left! Looking forward to what ios13 brings...

Title: Not getting activated
Reviews: I am not able to activate iphone after several attempts. Today only i purchased.

Title: I phone XR blue
Reviews: Received mobile through amazon while buying new set it self speaker 🔊 problem still not received any feedback from amazon they  just sold the mobile not taking responsibility feel very bad. There is poor customer support since the amount of I phone XR 📱 Rs. 45k very huge.

Title: Excellent Phone, can be used as Dual Sim with E-SIM
Reviews: Purchased this phone for a friend and he is very happy with the performance of the phone. Camera quality and features are the industry standard. For anyone refraining from buying an iPhone because it has only a single SIM slot,  please be informed that this Phone does support Dual SIM if you use E-SIM. Airtel and Jio, for now, has E-SIM facility. For a more detailed review do visit my review website at excitedneurons(dot)com

Title: iPhone XR review
Reviews: First of all the Face ID is crazy fast and accurate even during pitch darkness. The phone is fast and smooth, you don’t feel like you are having just 3Gb of RAM, it handles anything you through at it without a hitch. The phone does feel premium and at the same time delicate because the backside is glass,”as you know glass is glass and glass will break”. The pictures taken from the camera are good but the lack of night scape sort of things is a con. Overall the phone is great, although the side bezels are thick, you get used to it. The LCD screen does not lack anything compared to the OLED’s in day to day usage. You just stop thinking those things when you are using daily.

Title: Not worth buying
Reviews: Its a good phone but definitely not worth 50k1. The camera sucks as compared to the price of the phone. Android will offer you far better quality at a very less price.2. The keyboard really irritates you as typing is not user friendly and moreover there is no separate numerical pad like android.3. No split screen like android4. Cannot copy paste an OTP. You need to scroll down the notifications bar, read and then manually type in.5. Its really a heavy phone.6. There is no inbuilt music player and the equaliser cannot be customised.7. Battery life is ok. If you are not connected with the Apple Watch then Bluetooth is off and it will run for 18 hrs with phone data on and with limited operations. With gadgets connected, not even 12 hrs.I have been using this phone for 3 months now. What i have understood is that android is by far a better option in terms of everything.

Title: Good product
Reviews: Fantastic Apple phone in this price range.Almost all features are good. Camera is OK. Battery life very good. Face detection very good. Phone size is just perfect. Design very elegant.Apple as usual gives pathetic accessories. Charging is damn slow with original adapter I suggest better to use other faster travel adapter. Works perfectly with other adapter and charges quite fast. Earphone is OK. Sound quality is good but often falls off.Overall excellent Apple product.

Title: Heavy phone with decent battery life
Reviews: I bought XR after 11 came out. I read a few articles and saw a few video reviews which said that the real difference between the phones was the camera and that it was negligible and not worth the price difference. This phone is actually quite heavy but the trade-off is that the battery life is significant.  Even with gaming and video watching the battery was fully charged will last from 9 to 7 W/O going red.

Title: Worst response from Amazon
Reviews: I have received this product with manufacturing defect in it. Screen has LED bleeding problem. Contacted the service team of Apple and they are ready to replace.But the worst part is from Amazon, even though there is a replacement policy, it is use less.All the options route to Apple customer care only.You can not call the amazon customer care executive. Even if you try to call it will route you to Apple customer care only.In my opinion it is ok to use Amazon for mobile accessories but not for the Costly I phones. Better go to the stores and buy.

Title: Great phone.
Reviews: I am a moderate user so at the end of the day my battery is around 60% which is good considering the battery backups of previous iPhones. Should have provided with 12watt charger instead of 5watt charger. The display is very good and iOS is buttery smooth. Free Apple TV subscription is waste as it asks for money to buy or rent movies in the app and have very limited movies and series. The Face ID is good but it doesn’t work when mask is on. They should have provided biometric unlock also as every time you have to enter 6 digit passcode which is quite frustrating. Overall nice buy with discount and bank offer.

Title: Vibration motor stopped after 8-9 months😕.
Reviews: I switched from android to iOS for the forst time and it was quite a different experience for me. The OS is very neat but not as open as of android, yes it a bit annoying at first but now I’ve  got used to it and it is normal now. One of the major issues I found was with the hardware, I mean the vibration motor suddenly stopped working one day and I was quit worried about it. I searched for solutions but didn’t find one . After some months (8-9 months) it started working automatically but, it stops every now and then. I’m not sure if I can repair it but, yes it is quite annoying.

Title: Value for Money!!
Reviews: Awesome product !! Far better than spending almost double for Xs, XS MAX, 11 as the difference is only display and camera. Otherwise everything is same. It would be definitely a bigger upgrade if anyone is switching from iphone 8 or 8+ to it. The entire UI is different. Icing on the cake is the PRIVACY, its the utmost priority of Apple it seems. Without you face id, nobody can see even the notifications. Its a must buy product.

Title: Camera is pathetic
Reviews: I will not recommend anyone to buy XR,if you are considering iphone from camera perspective.Instead go for some other version.Really repenting, post buying this, as camera is pathetic, not expected this from iphone.Mi 6 and one plus 7 photos are superb and much better than XR.Else as a phone Iphone anyways is goodBattery life is superb,last for a day with continuous usage.Face recognition has no issue.Processing is faster.

Title: Working fine expect battery,earphones noise cancellation and face lock
Reviews: Performance wise supeprb,camera clarity nice, and over all goodExcept battery life i heard XR having good battery life but when phone is in idle state it’s ok but when we start using it battery running out fastly and best was for me compare to iphone charger(taking aroung 3hr) my mi power bank boosting power to battery with in 1 and half hourCompare to finger print face scanner taking bit sec to open some times when face cover with mask or helmet need to use passcodeNoise cancellation when using headset not working fine mostly iam facing this right

Title: Honest and Logical Review
Reviews: This phone is good , i got it at Rs.45000 during this diwali sale, but after using this i was bound to think on the various aspects : considering the Ram and ROM ( 3 GB and 64 GB ) in this case , is the price ok , i felt that its really overpriced, we can get more features in Phones like Redmi Note 8 pro which is priced at around 16K ( discounts and bank offer are separate) this means we are paying for brand name or goodwill price simply to Apple. Then why we are not going for One plus models made in china as Apple i phone is also made in china for your information.I have given my honest and genuine feedback. Now its up you to decide whether to go for this or other brand with more features but at half the price of Apples i phone Xr. Hope my review helps.

Title: Best value for money iPhone
Reviews: This is the best value for money you can get. iPhone 11 has only a marginal improvement compared to iPhone XR. But the performance is almost at par with them. I had an iPhone 6s, which ran almost 4 years. Touch and feel you get from your iphone is unparalleled with any other phone.(I have used all platforms)Screen Size: it’s a bit bigger but that’s what you get in all other phones as well these days.Processing speed: very fast, lightning, and stays like that for another four yearsCamera: professional quality guaranteed, night photos are also very good, portrait mode is amazing, beats all other android phone hands down.

Title: Display is not good at all.
Reviews: My Opinion-I don't know why people are saying it's an excellent display, personally i don't like the display at all, No doubt colour accuracy is good, Touch response is good, but it not that sharp, text looks blurry.Reason- So called "Liquid Retina Display". Guys it's just 326ppi, personally i can see the pixels, texts are not that sharp they looks little blurry.Media Consumption- Definitely it is not good for media consumption as watching YouTube videos on iPhone XR is not that great. I watch lot of YouTube videos on my phone, so in iPhone XR the quality of the video is 828p not even 1080p. Yes some people argues that it shows the option of 1080p in YouTube app, but it is not 1080p video. It can play only 828p video which is the downscale of 1080p video. If you watch a review by MKBHD, he also mentioned that "Definitely the screen is not that sharp & it cannot 1080p videos". He mentioned the same thing in his review video of iPhone 11 also.I personally used high quality AMOLED display made by Samsung. Samsung Note 8 Samsung S9 Plus OnePlus 6t & now i am using OnePlus 7 Pro. Yes i sold my iPhone XR within a week.

Title: Please don't buy from Amazon and this seller
Reviews: I bought a iphone XR  ,Which has some screen and camera issues  ,screen is freezing ,Amazon custome r Care talk like we did mistake ,not gud behaviour called to amazon ,they asked to go Apple store,already visited there from apple support we got information battery already replaced of this IMIE number.I told them ,but they were not agree,they again and again saying go there,we cant replace it.we just requested also said we paid 50000 for that but they dont agree,so if you buying pn and you have any issue in phone even it would be damaged they are not going to replace IT,and this seller is selling refurbish product.

Title: 5 STARS FOR PRODUCT
Reviews: I phone always like a dream phone... purchased this  in diwali sale in 38 k rs. My previous phone was s8 moved to xr and no regrates.Battery- 5/5lasts for nearly 1.5 days (screen times for everyday applications is about 9-10 hrs)Screen quality- 5/5 coming from i phone 6 and s8 there is not much difference. Lcd screen is good.Camera- 3.5/5 - if you want only camera phone than go for the higher versions of i phone. Night shots are average otherwise it is good. Potrate mode is also not available for objects.Value for money- 5/5 - Always beacause it gives you 4-5 software updates and you can use 3-4 years easily . And it is apple :-)

Title: Iphone xr
Reviews: First of all got it for 38000.  Great at this price but or maximum at 45k nothing more than that for this phone.Pros:1. Great battery life: When you are not using your phone battery doesn't goes down even 1% that is phenomenal.2. A12 bionic: The processor is super quick doesn't lag at all and performance is top notch. No phone other than latest iphone can match that performance.3. Camera: great click even though it's only a single camera.4. Design: No chin and that is great. Weight of phone seems perfect when you hold it.5. Haptic vibration: It may seems a small thing but when you it comes into play it makes your experience just super fulfilling. Very satisfying vibrations and no other phone except oneplus7t has it.6. Os: super easy to use.7. Dual sim: after sometime yes iphones can be used as dual sim port but has only one sim slot other sim will be used as esim offered only by jio and airtel.Cons:1. Display: Flagship phone with no 1080p display is seriously disappointing.2. Charger: No fast charger in the box.3. Notch: Very big notch looks very bad at times.4. Single camera: It takes good photos but iphone with dual camera is just phenomenal. Camera is good but not great.Final verdict: If you hate lags, not in a hurry to charge the phone, can neglect notch and not very much into camera usage then this is the phone for you. Display is not a very big problem as its the same display of iphone8 and notch can be neglected. Now you can make your choice. But a great phone to buy

Title: Want an iOS? XR is currently the best value for money by apple. Want to know how? Read completely.
Reviews: Battery life will surely amaze the buyer, I use to charge my iPhone 7 Plus at the 100 percent to my office at 10AM  and while returning by 7 PM it used to be approx 7-8 percent remaining. I use my phone for basic tasks and PUBG during break. Now when XR came to my hand the very first day I forgot to charge my phone to 100 percent and took it to my office at 62 percent. Amazingly it had 33 percent charge while I was leaving my office and I even played 3 evoground matches of pubg that day during my break. It was my dream to have long lasting iOS enabled devices which came true with this spectacular device. One should blindly go for it if performance and battery is your huge concern.Camera is again auspicious. It clicks the images similar to iPhone XS, the only difference you will find b/w XS and XR camera is potrait mode. XS have dual camera, hence have the capability of depth sensing and gives bokeh effect to non human objects like chair and towers, but in XR you get single camera which can snap pics with bokeh effect using ML hence only human face will be highlighted there. I personally think it’s not worth to go for XS just to click non human objects with bokeh effects. I would strongly suggest XR to everyone who is planning to get an iOS device. Its actually a value for money.Coming to performance, none of the apple competitors have yet released the chipset much powerful than A12 Bionic so just assume it to be more powerful than best android device in market.

Title: GUYS BE CAREFUL, THEY SAY 7 DAYS REPLACEMENT BUT ONLY 1 YEAR SIMPLE WARRANTY
Reviews: GUYS BE CAREFUL, THEY SAY 7 DAYS REPLACEMENT BUT ONLY 1 YEAR SIMPLE WARRANTYI received phone on 24th June'2020 and found major voice hearing issue, spoke to Amazon to replace the phone on 27th June within 7 days as mentioned on their App but they told me to speak to Apple directly reg the issue and Apple refused to replace it, they said your phone comes under 364 warranty only and not replacement as committed on Amazon App.......................so think before you purchase on Amazon, I am still fighting and trying to replace otherwise warranty is valid for 1 year by Apple. VERY SAD AND BAD EXPERIENCE

Title: Another awesome product from Apple!
Reviews: I've been using my iPhone XR for over 10 months now. So far, everything's hunky-dory.While setting up the phone, you'll be asked to choose between passcode and Face ID. Choose the Face ID. It's makes your life much easier (having to punch in the passcode every single time you need to unlock the phone  is very irritating, trust me!).iPhone XR's battery lasts much longer than iPhone 8's (which I exchanged for iPhone XR). Once fully charged, the battery lasts for around 2-3 days, assuming the phone is being used for approximately 2 hours/day for activities such as browsing facebook, instagram, reading Kindle e-books, listening to music (streaming as well as downloaded), and watching YouTube videos (for a couple of minutes).The notch is an interesting design choice made by Apple. Some apps like YouTube choose to hide it, others don't. But when you take into account the edge-to-edge display, and the sleek design, the notch seems to add to the beauty of the phone.Both the front & rear cameras are good.As far iOS 12 is concerned, it's better than iOS 11. It's less buggy, and loads & runs apps smoothly.

Title: Amazing and Durable
Reviews: Best battery life in an iPhone.Amazing Processor A11.Privacy take care.Supports Fast charging but 5w charger in the box.Got it for ₹38k in Sale.

Title: Perfect
Reviews: iPhone XR meets & even exceeds all my expectations in quite varied facets. XR is already been in market for a year, so instead I’ll concentrate on sharing “Amazon” experience buying it.Well, 1) Phone was delivered within 36 hours of placing order; 2) It was packed in very secure package & was handed over after I shared OTP; 3) The phone box was sealed (I wasn’t expecting this to be the case, nevertheless I’m pleasantly surprised); 4) The phone has manufacture/Import date of Sept’19 i.e current month, so Amazon is selling hot fresh inventory.To sum it all up, I couldn’t have asked for more really. Super glad with both iPhone XR and Amazon.PS: Face ID is lot more convenient than I had ever imagined, even to the extent that I find it better than having Touch ID. Camera quality is top draw & battery life -,so far so good.

Title: Awesome device
Reviews: Awesome cellphone i have ever used..i have switched from Android(OP) to ios..which I believe..it cannot be compared with any os we have  in market..coming to the device it’s really awesome battery on an average use last for a day..i don not play any game..I mostly spend time on Twitter and on other apps...the only worst thing i find is the charging rate which really sucks...it takes appx an hour to full juice. Camera has been the best...not as good as of Samsung s series and note series  but for me its the best...face recognition works like charm...

Title: Not too good not too bad
Reviews: Good phone. Being a 1st time user of ios, i liked it a lot. Although the compromises made for this phone like inferior display, big bezels nd notch are cleary visible and annoying. Battery life is top notch although supplied 5 watt charger is a trash. Using my iPad charger to charge it fast. Camera gives dslr quality pics in daylight nd outdoors but night photos are below average. In total a good package to try out apple ecosystem.

Title: A premium mobile in hand
Reviews: Thanks for Amazon for genuine product and safe delivery. Couple of month back i bought this mobile for 55,999. I am quite shock to see the reduction in price. However, The mobile works absolutely fine and truely a flagship phone. Smooth UI, Outstanding camera and average battery life.While business people who are into phone in most of the hours will feel heavy because of mobile weight (194 gm), My hands started to feel heavy during long calls and using applications. If you are not an iOS fan i would suggest Oneplus that deliver same features with less phone weight comparatively.

Title: Worth the value
Reviews: I bought 128g  at 57k performing much faster and more smoother experience on an iPhone. Battery life is above average. app switching is lightning fast.Portrait mode is working fine with perfect edge detection. PUBG freaks you can play in fully max video settingwithout any lag at all.Though the packaging was terrible only one plastic wrap was there, expected to be inside a box .

Title: Amazing phone at an amazing price-Go for it.
Reviews: 6.1 inches screen for a phone is pretty good, feels heavy, but all that pales in comparison after the actual features of the phone are unlocked.I was informed that phone can be tracked even when switched off as per the new ios 13 update, camera quality is better , both front and back , fast charging too is great, i like the idea that the body is aluminium made as compared to the latest which after checking and reviewing holds up better after drop tests, face id recognition is great, but need back up in the form of app lock for unauthorized usage.Overall a great phone, at a amazing price, do not miss the chance to buy it, even if you feel it is heavy on your wallet, you wont get such a good phone loaded with features else where.Its like how the iphone 7 was the benchmark for future models , same goes for this phone.

Its bionic A12 chip is good and smooth but battery performance is bad, and it doesn't even have  Fingerprint sensor, the face detection wont work at all angles. Need to stop buying this apple product.

Title: Great Mobile Great Deal  In Amazon

Title: A VFM Apple product.
Reviews: A reasonably good product if you are into the Apple ecosystem and don't want to splurge.Great screen even though it's a LCD, decent battery life, hallmark Apple craftsmanship.A small peeve, face-id not working 100%.Overall, a great cell at this price range.

Title: The best option for upgrade who own Iphone 6 or 7
Reviews: I am using apple from last 7 years. And never change apple phone frequently. I was using iPhone 6s from last 3 years but due to less space and batter backup, I need to upgrade it. I choose Apple iPhone because it's in between AppleXS and Apple X. Hardware A12 bionic chipset with 3 GB ram give my phone high speed on top of 128GB space thrilled the whole experience. In this new apple XR I still missed the center button especially when I play the games. Camera output is an amazing especially back camera. Also would like to appreciate the battery backup, I hardly change more than one time in 24hours. Now I do not need to my battery back always along with me ROFL.

Title: Smart Choice
Reviews: The best decision that I took was to give away my Samsung galaxy S8 and get this phone. I was skeptical at first considering on paper specs and the obvious inferior display. But I used it in a retail store and I didn’t mind the display at all. It was one drawback that i could live with if i was getting everything much better than on the android side at the price range.

Title: Amazing 😍

Don't be a sad face for 3GB Ram, it's better than 8GB Android. Facelock can recognize you in dark. There is no finger print scanner. But still it's no issues

Title: Only satisfied but certainly did't get the best one

Probably you have dealt with a wring product, sorry but not completely happy with XR. May be i will think next time when i will be upgrading my phone.

Title: Lovely phone with poor battery
Reviews: Iphone is good. It dont have fingerprint reader, only faceid and password.Battery backup sucks. Have to charge thrice in two days.ios is good and many improvements and features.Design is amazing.Camera is good but could be better.

Title: Good
Reviews: Good phone. Great screen size. But apple still has not fixed low light shooting. It still looks like crap when compared to oppo or Samsung or the +one series. It’s incredible how we end up paying so much for an iPhone which still doesn’t get its camera right. Battery life is good. Downside is the replacement of the phono jack for headphones with its lightning socket which operates both charger and headphones - which means you can only do one thing

Title: Delighted on iPhone XR 128GB White!!!
Reviews: I just got my iPhone XR 128GB White phone. I feel am lucky to get 12% discount on MRP. In addition 10% discount on my Credit card. Also an 2% instantaneous cashback on a special day. Total paisa-vasool!!The product is brilliant and delivered right on time as promised by Prime delivery.Crossed my finger until it delivered in hand. But finally It was very neat and no damages at all. Little press marks on box which we can understand it has to travel from long distance!The phone is absolutely marvelous. Loaded with iOSv12.3 and upgrade notification for 12.4. Optimum size for viewing screen. Face reco works brilliantly. Built quality is good. I have ordered for white color, I expected Chrome on the edges, but it is mat silver finish which brought down the look. On other hand it helps in gripping the phone.!!Before buying i saw feedback on Appario Retail Private Ltd and most rated really good. Now i also give 5* rating for them.!!

Title: Useless purchasing from Amazon
Reviews: Want to return but u are not accepting it.. Bad experiance on amazon... Really paying a huge amount and giving bad quality products....

Title: Okayish
Reviews: 1.The battery life is good.2.Build quality is okay. Power button is slightly squeaky. The screen gets scratched very easily.The build quality of my iPhone 6s was better. It fell more than 2 dozen times and still standing strong and intact.3.Camera isn’t much of an upgrade from 6s (except for front camera). Night photography is not good.4.Screen is big and wide. Good for videos and reading.5.Got it for 53K for 128GB on Amazon. Great Deal!6. Sound quality is 3.75/57. LCD screen is better for my eyes than LED. I can feel the difference.Verdict-If you can’t afford XS and XS Max and want a new iPhone, then this is a good phone.

Title: Need to return my phone

Title: Awesome phone (except the camera is average for the price)
Reviews: This phone is just awesome. Screen is really good and bright, you can’t really make a difference between the screen and an AMOLED screen. I have compared them side by side. You can’t really say the difference.Camera is average but I’m not a camera person so don’t care much about that. Although OIS is cool thing to have for my casual video recording when needed.Trust me this thing works like fluid-like smooth. It doesn’t lag and plays any game you throw at it. And not to mention the Face ID so nice. Sometimes it gets annoying a little as I was used to phones with fingerprint reader.Phone is quite bulky and will be even more when slap screen protector and cover on it. Also it thicker than normal android phones you see around these days. But it gives a nice grip for holding.Honestly if you have the budget, I don’t see any reason that might hold you back. It is great phone, and better than any other android phone that comes in this price point.

Title: Please read before buying
Reviews: Hell man! Im a oneplus fan till i buy this mobile,Camera of this phone is completely worse before i was using oneplus 6 ,op6 camera is much better when compared with op8.....and important point to note that this phone does not even compete with my moms phone samsung a50s which is 15k rs phone.Lastly if you dont trust reviews on this,Kindly reach me out atI will provide you the originals pictures,because i have wasted 40k ...not let you guys to wasteNote: i have seen all reviews in youtube,but all will say it is bit bad .....but it is completely bad.

Title: Great but always with some screen and body issues!
Reviews: I changed OnePlus 8, 4 times! Due to something or the other defects (like headache giving screens, line marks at the back of the body, etc) as it's expensive!Phone boxes were puffed, torned, some displays were dull if noticed closely, more warm and yellowish. No control by OnePlus on this. People go nuts like "wow what a display" not realizing that they are being given inferior quality displays of Samsung.I hope I really hope people strive for perfection to really understand and get what they are paying for by controlling their excitements a bit and forward stronger feedbacks, as I believe I was listened and Amazon India did helped me too.My 5th device came altogether from a different location, excellent box, phone built and display feels more broader even with same dimensions, no two parallel lines design or defect at the back, it's clean and curvy like OnePlus 8 8gb variant (mine is the 6gb one). Screen display is still more warm which I didn't want but colors are very punchy and clearly shows the display is far better than previous returned devices.1st OnePlus 8 8gb - Had a very long permanent line mark at the back of the body if looked closely.2nd OnePlus 8 8gb - Display's blue light filter had issues I'm sure as it gave me headache in seconds, eye strain as well.3rd OnePlus 8 6gb - 2 parallel lines on edges of the back body if the device was tilted a little, was like a dent kind of design or defect (I believe though this one had the best display even than the 5th one that I'm keeping and more smoother 90 HZ).4th OnePlus 8 6gb - 2 parallel lines were again there so I thought it's normal and was okay with it, but display was yellowish and dull, playing pubg with graphics optimization made the game look more ugly in extreme hd settings (hdr sucks). Looking at Images on articles, etc were looking just good.5th OnePlus 8 6gb variant - As told above there are no 2 parallel lines, punchy colors, not dull and very good display, however still yellowish in large part of the screen and whitish around above and right & left edges of the screen in vivid mode (I did noticed in some displays it was not this warm). I also noticed vivid mode was nicer and whiter in previous devices than this one whether they were dull or not.I also know screen being yellowish a bit makes video viewing an amazing experience to make it more natural for skin color, etc. But should be less and corrected with all the flaws mentioned. However, I'm tierd and somewhat satisfied but will want OnePlus to correct if possible with software update without compromising any quality of the display.It's said that Apple never compromises on quality, they even delay their production if they find any imperfections (I don't like iOS or use Apple though).  OnePlus should do like this.Not happy at all with this kind of support. I noticed paying more (when I got the 8gb one) was really like getting better qalutiy made device (the first one, if the issue mentioned wasn't there). This shouldn't be the case as this leads to disappointment and all variants should be given the same attention/perfection with just internal hardware changes.OnePlus 8 will be my first and last device for a short period of time. Will look for a brand who cares. 3 out of 5.

Title: Delivers what they promised.! ;)
Reviews: Great phone!Gaming performance is so great, device don't get heat up at all even at high settings!I played PUBG Mobile and details it provides were so exciting and make it feel real. Shadows of tree,stones, mud, etc. If you have small hands don't buy it for gaming, don't feel comfortable with small hands.Camera is good, can't say it is awesome!Battery life is great too, charge too fast!UI is as expected stock android, some pre-installed third party apps were also installed, you can uninstall all of them except Netflix.The back cover they provide is loose and cheap. Have to buy a new better one!Over all a great phone!Cheers! :)

Title: Poor Camera Quality.....Too Expensive
Reviews: Camera quality is worst than OnePlus 6T

Title: Heating Issue and Low Quality camera
Reviews: Badly Heating Issue

Title: Better phone but could have been the best
Reviews: Great phone, Amazon delivers it within 10 hours of ordering really happy there,Pros: Beast performanceGreat battery LifeBrilliant ScreenFluid 90hzAnd blazing fast oxygen os5gCons:Camera: have a 2megapixel camera for the sake of having 3 camera on the backRest of the camera are only averageHopefully upadates can fix that and given one plus history I think they will!Curved screen cause accidental touches and most covers can't cover phone fully in the front due to display Hence its prone to break more than regular flat screen phone like 7tHave a little bit of weight due to larger batteryPrincing is highly agressive but could have provided wireless charging and headphone jackIn the same price!Overall good phone if you want a future proof phone but this eyes closedBut if you are on a budget 7t can mostly get you there with better camera and almost as fast snapdragon 855plusChoose wisely

Title: Do NOT buy this expecting a stellar camera
Reviews: Obviously, you might have done extensive research, watched many review videos before coming here to make your purchase decision. There is only one way you will be happy with this purchase and that is, if you are looking for a slim, elegant, powerful, light weight device offering a premium in-hand feel. Day to day, if this is what is most important to you, then this is the device to get.Camera is going to serve you well on many occasions (when the lighting is good). People might have told you that the camera system is mediocre. That is not entirely true. There have been few software updates and I can confidently say that yes, the camera is neither great nor is it bad. It delivers decent pictures (when the lighting is good) and if you are not a absolute camera geek, then this will meet and succeed all of your expectations. Incase you are a camera geek, then get the 8Pro and dont think about saving money.Conclusion: Feels expensive and has a nice balance in the hand (Its very light and is a joy to use). The glacial green in matte finish is makes the front of the device look expensive (with the dark edge-to-edge AMOLED panel). It performs like it should. It has an QC 865 after all! It will easily get you through more than a day with a full charge. Its a very low risk decision. Cant go wrong - Just buy the damn thing!

Title: Shame on you Oneplus
Reviews: With 3.5 mm jack adapter phone not giving any sound I tested many earphones but it does not work shame on you Oneplus

Title: best and most reliable phone at this price
Reviews: I am writing this review after using this phone for 7 days. I believe real user reviews are more useful than Youtube tech reviews which are highly biased and not practical. I bought the 6 GB variant which is available at 42k. Don't go for 8 GB variant and spend 3k more of your valuable money. For normal users, 6 GB RAM is more than sufficient. 2 GB RAM doesn't make your phone fast, it's the processor that does that work. At 42k price, this is the best option available right now. I would rate it 4.5/5.1. Design: It is an amazing, premium looking phone. Glass back feels awesome. weight management and dimensions are also great. The curved display looks amazing.2. Display: Display is bright and visible in direct sunlight. At the lowest brightness level, I did not notice any flickering. In Natural mode, I noticed some yellowish color, it is some software issue or it is like that only. I changed to Advanced>AMOLED wide gamut, now it works perfectly. The curved display doesn't make any difference after 1 or 2 days and it comes with "fragile tag" so be prepared to take extra care of it. 90hz really makes the difference over 60hz. Once you use 90hz display, going back to 60Hz would feel like the phone is lagging.3. Performance: It is a snapdragon 865. Performance is buttery smooth.4. Software: This is my first oneplus phone. Coming from Motorola phone, my first priority was a stock android experience. OxygenOS is best android UI right, stock android experience with all required customization. Oneplus also provide timely and long term software updates to its phones which is the very good thing.5. Battery: I was using my phone at 90Hz all the time with all animations on. You would easily get whole day of battery life even if you are moderate to heavy user. For initial 1-2 charging cycles. I was getting around 6 hours of SOT which improved to 7-7.30 hr of SOT. Charging speed is also great, it would charge from 10 to 95% in around 50 mins.6. Call quality and in other day to day usage, I haven't find any issues yet. Speakers are also very loud and clear.7. Camera: here comes the one and an only area which I didn't like. Primary camera and ultrawide angle camera is good but not any improvement over 7T. and 2 MP macro camera is really pathetic and useless. I also facing some issue in front camera. Low light photos are blurry and during video calls, it zooms the face and produces blurry face. i hope Oneplus gives software updates and solves all camera problems. I found a solution for myself by downloading Gcam which is giving better results but still for 42k phone, camera is not that good.Conclusion: No phone is perfect. This has issues in camera department. but I believe other than that this phone is great, go for it. When You spend more than 35-40K, always go for brand value like Oneplus, Samsung, Apple.I hope you find this review useful. I Will update if I find any issue in the future.

Title: Iconic but Camera could have been even better
Reviews: I have been using One Plus 8, 6GB RAM, 128 GB version for past two days. I bought this phone at 39,999(2K discount with SBI CC). I was bit skeptcial before i bought this phone as i was planning to buy the PRO version, but i do not regret anymore :)This is my first encounter with luxury segment and believe me it's amazing.Truly iconic experience. It's a master piece in terms of performance. works at lightning speed, face detection is utterly smooth, finger print sensor on the screen works like a charm.Very smooth display(90 hz). You will see a notable difference from 60 Hz phones available out in the market.Built in Alexa capability, ofcourse you have to install the app from Play store.Camera is really good when the object is closer and detail is lost to some extent for distant objects. It could have been better at this price segment, but then no complaints.Final verdict: Just close your eyes and buy it if you are looking for a ultra smooth experience and nice looking smartphone and you may not be fully satisfied if you are looking for a Camera phone matching with Apple standards.

Title: Amazing Phone!
Reviews: Some people are comparing Oneplus 8  with Onplus Nord. In case you are confuse and you have the budget please go for this one for following reasons:1.Oneplus nord has cheap plastic frame. This one has aluminum. Build quality is superb and premium.2. Nord has 8mp wide angle camera this one has 16mp which rocks3. Nord doesn't have stereo speakers. The speaker on plus 8 are stereos with dolby support.4. Nord has UFS 2.1 vs Oneplus has UFS 3.05. Nord has ugly dual camera holes in front compared to oneplus 8 having single punch hole6. The most significant difference is a flagship processor. Nothing can beat snapdragon 865. Nord has mid range processor. This one is a beast7. Although the resolution and refresh rate is same. Nord has a low quality display while  oneplus has used samsung Amoled panel with eye care certification in oneplus 8.8. Curved display is premium feature which looks good you don't get that in Nord. It make phone easy to hold as well9. Oneplus 8 supports usb type C3.0 vs nord has slower type C 2.010. Although both Nord and oneplus 8 are not officially waterproof, oneplus 8 is actually some waterproof without certification.11. Nord is not future proof due to performance this one can last you atleast 3 year Snapdragon 865 is not a joke
